extension.name: googleDirections - To Here
extension.author: kksou
extension.description: This plugin is an extension of the googleDirections plugin. You specify a designated place to be the destination, and let the user enter the adddress he or she is coming from. Google will then provide the driving or walking directions from the user-specified address to your designated place.
